coupon.sys.core.dao.db

Class CustomerDaoDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • coupon.sys.core.dao.db.CustomerDaoDB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CustomerDao

    public class CustomerDaoDB
extends java.lang.Object
implements CustomerDao
    This class implements all the methods in CustomerDao interface. It has an empty constructor and it as an attribute of ConnectionPool type
    Author:
    Yehuda.Hizmi

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkDbExistence(Customer customer)
      This method checks if a customer with the same name already exists in the DB.
      void createCustomer(Customer customer)
      This method insert a new customer into the data base (Customer table) Before the method insert the information it gets a connection from the connection pool and once it finishes or we get an exception the connection is return back.
      void createCustomerCouponRecord(long cust_id, long coupon_id)
      This method insert a record into Customer Coupon table every time a customer purchase a new coupon Before the method retrieves the information it gets a connection from the connection pool and once it finishes or we get an exception the connection is return back.

      This method return a collection of coupons based on the price it gets as a parameter Before the method retrieves the information it gets a connection from the connection pool and once it finishes or we get an exception the connection is return back.

      • login

        public boolean login(java.lang.String custName,
                     java.lang.String password)
              throws CouponSystemException
        Description copied from interface: CustomerDao
        This method return true if the customer name and the customer password match to the information stored in the DB else false. Before the method check the existence it gets a connection from the connection pool and once it finishes or we get an exception the connection is return back.
        Specified by:
        login in interface CustomerDao
        Parameters:
        custName - - The customer name
        password - - the customer password
        Returns:
        - Return true in case the data is correct otherwise false
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - - throws a general exception with a message and the original SQLException that causes it

      • createCustomer

        public void createCustomer(Customer customer)
                    throws CouponSystemException
        Description copied from interface: CustomerDao
        This method insert a new customer into the data base (Customer table) Before the method insert the information it gets a connection from the connection pool and once it finishes or we get an exception the connection is return back.
        Specified by:
        createCustomer in interface CustomerDao
        Parameters:
        customer - - a customer object with all the relevant information to be inserted. The id is automatically given and updated back into the object
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - - throws a general exception with a message and the original SQLException that causes it

      • removeCustomer

        public void removeCustomer(Customer customer)
                    throws CouponSystemException
        Description copied from interface: CustomerDao
        This method delete a customer from the data base. The delete process is as follow: 1.Delete all the relevant records from Customer_Coupon table 2.Delete all the relevant records from Customer table Before the method delete the information it gets a connection from the connection pool and once it finishes or we get an exception the connection is return back.
        Specified by:
        removeCustomer in interface CustomerDao
        Parameters:
        customer - - the customer to be deleted
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - - throws a general exception with a message and the original SQLException that causes it
